Company: Lake County residents and Major League Baseball players
Description of incident: A Chicago man apparently              removed documents from a trash bin outside SFX Baseball Inc., a sports              agency that deals with Major League Baseball. Some current and former MLB players and county residents were affected.He used information              from the documents to commit identity theft. Information found during a search of the thief's              home included SSNs, dates of birth, canceled paychecks, obituaries, and              infant death records.
